skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: radio city f. m.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
With FM transmission at 106.5 MHz, Rádio Cidade implemented a new radio concept in Matão and the region, based on absolute professionalism, quality of programming and investment in professionals and state-of-the-art equipment.

Maintaining a diversified schedule and up to date with new market trends, the broadcaster's focus is to offer entertainment, information and services to build listener loyalty and guarantee effective advertising returns for its advertisers.

To serve and present the best solution to the client, Rádio Cidade has a specialized team in its Commercial Department, which operates based on segmented audience research to better target the media, according to the target audience.

Bringing your brand to Rádio Cidade guarantees credibility and identification with your audience.

Radio Cidade FM, 106.5

“IT’S IN THE CITY, IT’S TOO GOOD”

Disclaimer: Content in Portuguese

The radio content is only in Portuguese. We do not guarantee complete accuracy and are not responsible for misunderstandings. Interruptions may occur. Your understanding is your responsibility.
